title: Stuart Corsar
text:
Stuart Corsar (born 28 March 1984 in <a href="Inverurie">Inverurie</a>, <a href="Scotland">Scotland</a>) is a former <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player for <a href="Glasgow%20Warriors">Glasgow Warriors</a> at the <a href="Rugby%20union%20positions%23Prop">Loosehead Prop</a> position.
Corsar was a member of Glasgow Warriors Elite Development Players (Academy squad) was promoted to a full-time professional contract in 2006.
He then moved to England to play with the <a href="Rotherham%20Titans">Rotherham Titans</a>.
From there he moved on to play for the <a href="Doncaster%20Knights">Doncaster Knights</a>.
Corsar was capped by Scotland at various age grades and finally earned a <a href="Scotland%20A%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Scotland 'A'</a> cap.
After concussion forced him to quit playing, he moved into coaching, first with <a href="Aberdeen%20GSFP%20RFC">Aberdeen GSFP</a> before moving onto coach Garioch RFC, his first amateur club. Left in 2017.
